backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing blob storage, user roles, approvals, profiles, folders, files, and related metadata with access control APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, access control flow, profile setup, query cleanup, and rendering of the file interface.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: UI component showing pending-approval state with copyable Principal ID and instructions.
Empty placeholder file for admin management UI.
frontend/src/components/FileList.tsx: Full file manager handling browsing, search, uploads, folder navigation, sorting, deletion, and file preview modal.
frontend/src/components/FileListHeaderRo: Renders a sortable file list header row with clickable columns and sort arrows.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewModal: Displays a modal for previewing files with support for images, videos, audio, documents, text, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Shows the app footer with version info and a promotional link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main header with authentication controls, user info, theme toggle, and admin panel access.
frontend/src/components/ManagePanel.tsx: Provides an admin panel for managing members, roles, and storage stats.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Handles initial user profile creation with username validation and uniqueness checks.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/ZoomPanViewer.ts: Provides zoom and pan functionality for wrapped content using mouse interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessBootstrap.ts: Runs initializeAccessControl once per session per principal and refreshes access-related React Query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for access checks, user profiles, file listings, and related mutations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/canisterIds.ts: Resolves backend and frontend canister IDs from multiple environment and runtime sources.
frontend/src/lib/dragDropDirectory.ts: Extracts dropped files and directories using the FileSystem API and provides directory detection.
frontend/src/lib/fileLinks.ts: Builds full direct file URLs and copies them to the clipboard with fallbacks and notifications.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypes.ts: Provides utilities for extracting file extensions, determining MIME types, checking file categories, and generating human-readable type labels.
frontend/src/lib/folderNavigation.ts: Implements helpers for resolving folder paths, building breadcrumbs, and determining parent paths for files and folders.
frontend/src/lib/folderUpload.ts: Handles recursive folder upload by extracting folder structures, validating relative paths, creating folders, and uploading files with progress callbacks.
frontend/src/lib/formatTime.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into readable or compact date/time strings with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/id.ts: Generates secure 32‑byte random hex IDs for uploads.
frontend/src/lib/searchNormalize.ts: Normalizes strings for case- and diacritics-insensitive search and provides a substring match helper.
frontend/src/lib/sortFileSystemItems.ts: Sorts file system items deterministically by various fields with stable tie‑breakers and type-aware logic.
frontend/src/lib/subtreeIndex.ts: Builds a deterministic set of folder IDs in a subtree using a parent‑child index and recursive traversal.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, dark mode, content paths, plugins, and design tokens.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for restoring search result folder-path and filename-click behaviors, lists existing features and pending requests, and notes a file upload issue.
